text: Hey
Would you like to hear an interesting story?
No? That's too bad. Would you like to reconsider?

options.text: Yes, ok. This story better be good.

text: Great! You will not regret this.
Once upon a time, an old man lived in the village.
He was one of the most unfortunate people in the world.
He was always gloomy, he constantly complained and was always in a bad mood.
Would you like to be around someone like that?
People that complain usually are negative. You should always try and show them the bright side of life.
Exactly, People avoided him, because his misfortune became contagious. It was even unnatural and insulting to be happy next to him.
But one day, when he turned eighty years old, an incredible thing happened.
Can you guess what happended?
The Old Man was happy that day. He did not complain about anything.
Surprisingly so. He became happy.
The villagers gathered together and ask him what had happened
Would you like to know what he said?
He said - Eighty years I’ve been chasing happiness, and it was useless...
...and then I decided to live without happiness and just enjoy life.
That’s why I’m happy now.
The moral of the story is - Do not chase happiness. Enjoy your life.
